title: CTGP-7 Downloader
author: CTGP-7 Team
description:
CTGP-7 modpack for Mario Kart 7.
More info: ctgp-7.github.io
long_description: CTGP-7 is a modpack for Mario Kart 7 which includes several custom tracks, characters and music, as well as extra features such as a speedometer, speed modifier, backwards camera, among others. More info in the [CTGP-7 website](https://ctgp-7.github.io/).

script_message.message:
Note: Installing this will overwrite any existing install of
CTGP-7, only install if you do not already have CTGP-7.
